thread.title: DocuTech™ Webcast: Bi-Monthly “TRiDcast” to Feature Expert Compliance Discussion on Cash to Close Associated with the New Loan Estimate
thread.title_full: DocuTech™ Webcast: Bi-Monthly “TRiDcast” to Feature Expert Compliance Discussion on Cash to Close Associated with the New Loan Estimate

author: admin
title: DocuTech™ Webcast: Bi-Monthly “TRiDcast” to Feature Expert Compliance Discussion on Cash to Close Associated with the New Loan Estimate
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 9:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: DocuTech Corp. 
-- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- DocuTech™ Corp.: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) shook up the mortgage industry last month when it announced a proposal to move the TRID deadline to October 3. In an effort to help lenders prepare for the deadline, DocuTech™ Corp., a leading provider of compliance and documentation technology , has been publishing bi-monthly TRiDcasts through its Integrated Disclosure Resource Center . The next TRiDcast will be published on Sept. 8 and will feature an expert compliance discussion aimed at assisting lenders in successfully navigating cash to close and other costs on the new loan estimate. The TRiDcast will be published Sept. 8 at 10:00 a.m. MT at http://www.docutechcorp.com/compliances/tila-respa-integrated-disclosure-compliance-center/tridcasts Contact: To speak with host Fred Gooch, general counsel and vice president of compliance for DocuTech directly, or for more information, please contact David Jones at 678-781-7238 or david@williammills.com . 
About DocuTech™ Corp. 
Founded in 1991, Idaho Falls, Idaho-based DocuTech™ Corp. (DocuTech) provides a web-based solution that dynamically creates document packages based on the information from the lender’s loan origination platform. Recognized as one of the most innovative technology companies by multiple media outlets, DocuTech's software supports fully compliant eDelivery and Print Fulfillment services, along with robust eSignature services and tamper-proof audit trails. For more information visit the company's website at www.docutechcorp.com or follow them on social media at LinkedIn or Twitter @docutech .
